text: Huguette Dreyfus (30 November 1928 - 17 May 2016) was a French musician and educator. She was known for playing the harpsichord. She was born in Mulhouse, Alsace. Dreyfus taught at the Schola Cantorum, at the Sorbonne in Paris, and at the National Conservatory of Music and Dance of Lyon. Dreyfus died on 17 May 2016 in Lyon, aged 87. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2016 deaths Category:French musicians Category:French academics Category:People from Mulhouse
title: Huguette Dreyfus
